s.text: Quick primer on the Third Way: Blair says it is a union of democratic socialism and liberalism ("Our approach is neither laissez-faire nor one of state interference").
The Washington Post runs the tax-cut story below the fold and leads instead with an extraordinary first-person epic that recounts a harrowing 500-mile trek through Taliban country.
The op-ed page in today's WP "Outlook" features a piece by none other than British Prime Minister Tony Blair, entitled "Third Way, Better Way."
The op-ed page in today's WP "Outlook" features a piece by none other than British Prime Minister Tony Blair, entitled "Third Way, Better Way."

The op-ed page in today's WP "Outlook" features a piece by none other than British Prime Minister Tony Blair, entitled "Third Way, Better Way."

Among other details the Times describes the tense atmosphere at the rescue board meeting in the Fed conference room, in which rival firms were persuaded to take highly unusual collective bailout action.
